results.title: Metformin limits cerebral cavernous malformation development by targeting KLF4-mediated mitochondrial damage.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ also normalized the defects from @<m>DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@PDCD10 deficiency@@@, including disruption of tight junctions and excessive proliferation of endothelial cells.

results.title: AMPK Complex Activation Promotes Sarcolemmal Repair in Dysferlinopathy
results.text_hl: Finally, it was determined that treatment with the @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activator @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ improved the muscle phenotype in @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ and @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models of @<m>DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@dysferlin deficiency@@@.

results.title: Recommendations for diagnosis and management of metformin-induced vitamin B12 (Cbl) deficiency.
results.text_hl: In our review, recommendations for diagnosis and management of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@Cbl deficiency@@@ (@DISEASE_Drug_Fever @DISEASE_MESH:D000092582 @@@MICD@@@) in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ based on medical bibliography are presented and discussed.

results.title: Influence of duration and dose of metformin on cobalamin deficiency in type 2 diabetes patients using metformin.
results.text_hl: However, the influence of both duration and dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is unclear.

results.title: Metformin Prevents Peritoneal Dissemination via Immune-suppressive Cells in the Tumor Microenvironment.
results.text_hl: Cell-surface markers, cytokine production, and myeloid@DISEASE_Neural_crest_tumor @DISEASE_MESH:C536408 @@@-derived@@@ suppressor cells (MDSCs) were examined in cells from spleen and peritoneal lavage fluid. RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ exhibited suppressed intraperitoneal @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ growth and extended survival, and these effects were lost in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with severe combined @<m>DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@immunodeficiency@@@.

citations.NLM: Hirayama T, Nagata Y, Nishida M, Matsuo M, Kobayashi S, Yoneda A, Kanetaka K, Udono H, Eguchi S. Metformin Prevents Peritoneal Dissemination via Immune-suppressive Cells in the Tumor Microenvironment. Anticancer Res. 2019 Sep;39(9):4699-4709. PMID: 31519569
